decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 21-035-E00 (Location plan); 21-035-E01 (Existing loft plan); 21-035-E02 (Existing roof plan); 21- 035-E03 (Existing front elevation); 21-035-E04 (Existing rear elevation); 21-035-E05 (Existing east side elevation); 21-035-E06 (Existing west side elevation); 21-035-P01 Proposed Loft Plan (Rev. A); 21-035-P02 Proposed Roof Plan (Rev. B); 21-035-P03 Proposed Front Elevation (North- East facing) (Rev. B); 21-035-P04 Proposed Rear Elevation (South-West facing) (Rev. B); 21-035-P05 Proposed Side Elevation (South-East facing) (Rev. B); 21-035-P06 Proposed Side Elevation (West facing) (Rev. B); Planning, Design + Access Statement dated Jan 2024
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Replacement of 2no. dormer windows to the front roof slope (replacing 2no. roof lights); 1no. window to the front gable; 2no. dormer windows to the side roof slope (replacing 3no. roof lights); 1no. dormer window to the rear roof slope (replacing 1no. rooflight).
